attributes.action: We the undersigned call upon the UK government to rejoin the EU.
attributes.background:
Whilst we have not yet left the EU, we would like an undertaking that we will rejoin the EU as soon as possible.

We also call upon the government to join the Euro at the earliest opportunity so that the UK has full monetary union with the EU.

rejection.details:
The UK has not yet left the EU. We think the action you want is similar to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133606
